hero.tagline: Calm AI for travel crews and founder teams.
hero.subtitle: NodeVoyage, Ideonautix, and our consulting practice run on the same deliberate rituals.
hero.description: We pair tactile signage craft with transparent automation notes so every screen stays readable, explainable, and inclusive.
pillars: Shared rituals link product sprints, consulting engagements, and education programmes.
Accessibility, localisation, and inclusive writing shape every interface.
Every automation ships with plain-language documentation and opt-out controls.

nodevoyage.copy: Your AI-powered travel companion — plan, explore, and remember your journeys effortlessly.

ideonautix.copy: The productivity suite for modern creators — where every idea gets momentum.

focus.title: Respect for the humans using AI
focus.description: We slow down to explain the why, map the hand-offs, and keep every control easy to discover.
points: Light, dark, and contrast themes stay readable and consistent.
Reduced-motion preferences are honoured across interactions.
Clear audit trails keep AI decisions transparent.

hero.brand_aria: AlgoRhythmics logomark highlighted in the hero heading

story.title: Our story
story.reality_text: We stay close to signage floors and partner operations to keep prototypes practical.
story.mission_text: Ship approachable AI tools and consulting loops that explain themselves and invite collaboration.
story.vision_text: By 2026 every AlgoRhythmics launch will share one trusted workflow so partners can switch contexts without friction.

founders.title: Meet the founders
founders.subtitle: Two makers blending signage craft with calm AI

nikita.name: Nikita Jurtaevs
nikita.bio: Nikita keeps product direction, story, and partnerships aligned so every release feels tactile and honest.
nikita.current_position: Reclame Fabriek — shaping lighting, coating, and fabrication trials that inform our interfaces.

slaff.name: Vjaceslavs "Slaff" Trosins
slaff.bio: Slaff leads the engineering stack, data flows, and AI integrations powering our platforms.
slaff.position: Reclame Fabriek — refining controllers, LED systems, and tooling that steer our software choices.
slaff.philosophy: Systems thinking across hardware and software keeps solutions honest and dependable.
achievements: Runs a Google Cloud–first stack with SvelteKit, Flutter, Fastify, Prisma/PostgreSQL, and realtime messaging.
Bridges signage-grade controllers with transparent AI experiences.
Leads fundraising and multidisciplinary teams across both flagships.
slaff.brand_intro: We honed our craft while partnering with global brands on premium signage systems:
slaff.brand_context: Projects delivered with Reclame Fabriek (Daugavpils, LV) by both founders
slaff.algorhythmics_vision: Blend signage precision with cloud agility so AlgoRhythmics ships trustworthy, ready-to-use AI experiences.

partners.title: Partners who keep us sharp

partners.clients_description: Years of signage delivery for retail, finance, and aviation means our AI work stands on proven operations.

featured.summary: We prototype signage-grade experiences with trusted partners.
highlights: Signage R&D keeps our material tests honest.

reclameFabriek.summary: Reclame Fabriek runs the signage R&D floor where we test materials, controllers, and fabrication-ready automation.
highlights: 300+ LED neon colours engineered and certified in-house.
Custom controllers inform our realtime product design.
Export-first installs keep accessibility requirements front of mind.

hero.title: Where logic dances with creativity.
hero.subtitle: AlgoRhythmics builds AI platforms, consulting rituals, and educational programmes that keep innovation approachable for everyone—from students to enterprises.
hero.description: We choreograph technology with human-friendly signage craft, inclusive localisation, and transparent automation notes. The result is AI that feels calm, clear, and collaborative.

ai_companion.name: Люмен
ai_companion.greeting: Вітаю! Я Люмен — супутник AlgoRhythmics. Розкажу про нашу лабораторію, продукти та можливості партнерства з урахуванням українського ринку.
ai_companion.languageSwitch: Переходжу на українську. З чого продовжимо?
ai_companion.placeholder: Запитайте про лабораторію, продукт чи співпрацю...

suggestions.title: Дізнатися про лабораторію
suggestions.prompt: Чим AlgoRhythmics відрізняється від інших AI-агенцій?

suggestions.title: Платформа NodeVoyage
suggestions.prompt: Розкажи про платформу NodeVoyage для мандрівок.

suggestions.title: Покращити AI-ініціативу
suggestions.prompt: Які кроки допоможуть покращити наш AI-проєкт разом з AlgoRhythmics?

knowledgeBase.answer: AlgoRhythmics поєднує інженерну дисципліну та креативність. Ми допомагаємо партнерам будувати сміливі AI-рішення й розвивати культуру інновацій на ринках Східної Європи.
NodeVoyage — це інтелектуальний супутник мандрівника. Він будує історії маршрутів, враховуючи локальні рекомендації, сезонність та ваш стиль відкриттів.
Ideonautix — набір AI-коу-пілотів для команд, що працюють зі складними ідеями. Він структурує брейншторми, аналізує рішення та допомагає координувати міжнародні групи.
Напишіть на hello@algorhythmics.com або залиште заявку на сайті. Організуємо воркшоп чи discovery-спринт для старту спільної роботи.
Для покращення ми проводимо діагностичну сесію: перевіряємо готовність команди, доступні дані та очікування користувачів, після чого формуємо дорожню карту експериментів.

ai_companion.fallback: Я ще вчуся, але можу зʼєднати вас з нашою командою або надіслати матеріали про продукти й послуги.

faq.question: Who can join the pilot?
faq.answer: Latvian schools, vocational programmes, and LIAA partners.

faq.answer: We onboard facilitators and stay on-call during first runs.

faq.question: Do students need AI experience?
faq.answer: No. We start with fundamentals and build steadily.

hero.title: Educational Outreach & Community Building
hero.subtitle: Empowering learners, educators, and communities through AI.
hero.description: AlgoRhythmics is as much an educational movement as it is a tech studio. We nurture AI literacy across classrooms, libraries, and community hubs with programs that welcome every age.

intro.why_copy: Early exposure to AI concepts nurtures curiosity, confidence, and ethical awareness. Our outreach programmes are designed with signage clarity, playful experimentation, and rigorous safeguards so every learner can participate.
intro.partners_copy: We build bridges between schools, parents, industry mentors, and cultural partners. The result is a supportive ecosystem where logic and creativity collaborate in real time.
how_items: Co-create pilots with educators and align them with national curricula.
Pair every workshop with inclusive materials and multilingual support.
Document outcomes so communities can continue the rhythm independently.

partnerships.title: Anchors for learners, families, and mentors
partnerships.copy: From nationwide initiatives to after-school labs, each partnership invites communities to experience AI as something welcoming and responsible.

liaa.title: LIAA Partnership
liaa.copy: As the education sector ambassador with Latvia's Investment and Development Agency (LIAA), we co-create policy-ready pilots that bring AI literacy into formal curricula.
bullets: Curriculum integration with bilingual lesson kits and signage-inspired visuals
Teacher coaching cohorts and certification pathways that demystify AI
Shared research loops to publish findings and refine national standards

schools.title: School Programs
schools.copy: We activate classrooms with experiential AI—coding clubs, innovation labs, and creative sprints where students see logic dance with imagination.
bullets: Plug-and-play project modules for math, science, arts, and humanities
Workshops where students train mini AIs, compose generative art, or design ethical guidelines
Free or subsidised Ideonautix access so practice continues beyond the bell

community.title: Community Events
community.copy: Monthly workshops, webinars, and neighbourhood hackathons make AI approachable for parents, professionals, and the next wave of makers.
bullets: Open-to-all sessions that explain machine learning with tangible analogies
Parent Ambassador Network where families co-host learning circles at libraries
Guest mentors from industry and culture bridging real projects with storytelling

cultural.title: Cultural Partnerships
cultural.copy: Museums, libraries, and creative labs collaborate with AlgoRhythmics to blend technology with heritage—sparking curiosity across generations.
bullets: AI + Art exhibits that translate algorithms into sound, movement, and light
Story-driven installations where elders and kids explore AI together
Shared archives of lesson prompts and accessible exhibition guides

teachers.label: Teachers trained
teachers.description: Certified through our calm AI pedagogy labs.

impact.note: Metrics guide our iteration, but the stories matter most—like the student who chose a tech career after an AlgoRhythmics camp or the teacher who now leads AI clubs with confidence.

global.title: A global rhythm of shared learning
global.copy: Our outreach stretches beyond Latvia through European education networks, exchange programs, and shared research. Students collaborate across borders, trading ideas and building empathy through responsible AI projects.

cta.body: Bring your roadmap and we will map the rituals.

hero.title: Calm AI, crafted in Riga and Rotterdam
hero.subtitle: We are a Latvian-born studio where algorithms and artistry share the same rhythm. Our work blends signage precision, inclusive design, and playful experimentation.
hero.description: Founded in 2025 by technologists and educators, AlgoRhythmics believes logic and creativity belong together. From AI platforms to classroom pilots, we choreograph solutions that explain themselves and invite collaboration.

story.heading: Who we are
story.intro: What began as a small startup in Riga has grown into a bridge between education, culture, and industry. Early collaborations with Latvia's Investment and Development Agency (LIAA) helped us champion AI education nationwide.
story.culture: Inside the studio we host Logic/Dance sessions—one day a data science hackathon, the next an improv design workshop. This fusion of play and rigor shapes the experiences we ship.
milestones: Launched pilot programmes in local schools where students built projects with our tools and saw their ideas come alive.
Tailored Ideonautix for startups after listening to founders who needed calm, creative productivity support.
Expanded partnerships with museums, libraries, and international conferences—proving that logic and art thrive together.

values.title: Where logic dances with creativity
values.copy: Our mission is simple: make advanced AI accessible, enjoyable, and trustworthy. We pursue this mission through values that keep people at the centre.

education_first.title: Education first
education_first.copy: We nurture AI literacy in classrooms and community hubs. Free resources and respectful mentorship keep curiosity alive for every learner.

empowerment.title: Empowerment through technology
empowerment.copy: Whether you are a founder, teacher, or student, our tools are designed to feel welcoming, intuitive, and human-centred.

integrity.title: Innovation with integrity
integrity.copy: Ethical guardrails, privacy, and transparency guide every release. We document automation decisions in plain language so trust stays intact.

community.title: Community & collaboration
community.copy: Partnerships with parents, cultural institutions, and industry mentors turn AI into a shared dance rather than a solo act.

team.title: The people behind the rhythm
team.copy: Our team spans AI researchers, designers, educators, and community builders. Meet the founders who set the tone for collaboration and craft.

nikita.name: Nikita Jurtaevs
nikita.focus: Signage craft, storytelling, and partner delivery
nikita.bio: Nikita keeps product direction, accessibility, and partnerships aligned. He brings signage-floor realism to every interface and programme.

slaff.name: Vjaceslavs "Slaff" Trosins
slaff.focus: Cloud architecture, explainable AI, and operations
slaff.bio: Slaff orchestrates engineering, data flows, and AI integrations. He connects hardware-grade discipline with transparent software experiences.

finale.title: Join the rhythm
finale.copy: We welcome collaborators who care about accessible technology, joyful learning, and responsible automation. Whether you are exploring careers, partnerships, or sponsorships, let’s build together.

hero.title: Services & Solutions for Calm, Creative AI
hero.subtitle: Discover how AlgoRhythmics blends consulting, flagship platforms, and education to move ideas from spark to launch.
hero.description: Whether you are integrating AI into operations, equipping classrooms, or piloting a new product, our team choreographs the rhythm from strategy to support.

consulting.title: Strategy that keeps pace with your team
consulting.copy: Every engagement starts with signage-inspired clarity and ends with teams who understand their tools. These services pair calm rituals with measurable outcomes.

consulting.title: AI Consulting & Integration
consulting.summary: Leverage our founder-led consulting to map opportunities, translate them into transparent automation, and deliver AI that teams actually trust.
bullets: Discovery workshops that decode workflows and user journeys
Pilot sprints with explainable automation notes and opt-out paths
Change-management playbooks and training to keep crews confident

implementation.title: Technical Implementation & Training
implementation.summary: We stay on deck after the strategy is signed off. Our team deploys, documents, and trains your people so calm, inclusive AI becomes routine.
bullets: Hands-on configuration across cloud, data, and governance checkpoints
AAA-accessible documentation, onboarding guides, and office hours
Ongoing success metrics and iteration roadmaps tuned to your rhythm

platforms.title: Products where logic dances with creativity
platforms.copy: Our studio platforms are living proof of the methodologies we teach. They inherit the same frosted-glass calm, multilingual access, and rhythm you will feel in every engagement.

ideonautix.title: Ideonautix
ideonautix.summary: An AI partner for founders, educators, and teams who need momentum. Brainstorm, storyboard, and orchestrate projects with clarity and delight.
bullets: AI Pitch Assistant for decks, grants, and stakeholder updates
Collaborative canvases that balance focus dashboards with playful prompts
Inclusive localisation and voice options for multilingual communities

nodevoyage.title: NodeVoyage
nodevoyage.summary: Plan journeys with a companion that choreographs logistics and wonder. From family trips to nomad itineraries, NodeVoyage adapts to every explorer.
bullets: Personalised itineraries with live context, accessibility, and language options
Route optimisation and collaborative trip workspaces for teams or classrooms
Hospitality-ready previews for partners and agencies

education.eyebrow: Built with LIAA and Baltic schools
education.title: Educational Programs & Partnerships
education.summary: Bring AI literacy into classrooms, libraries, and community hubs. We co-design workshops, curriculum modules, and mentorship sprints that welcome every learner.
bullets: Curriculum blueprints, teacher training, and ready-to-run lesson plans
Community hackathons, parent ambassador network, and internship pathways
Impact tracking dashboards tuned to student confidence and reach goals

finale.title: Let’s choreograph your next milestone
finale.copy: Share your roadmap, pain points, or classrooms and we will assemble the right mix of consulting, platforms, and education support. Calm, human-centred AI is a conversation away.
